content: here comes the next part of my actual 6 series for you all squares are named and inspired by some great female musicians while designing the squares i listened to their music for me music is connecting people around the world just like crocheting you just can understand it everywhere that s what i really love both of them and if you like you can hear to their songs while working the squares we start with marina named after the italian reggae singer marina p for a starter i recommend you to listen to her album soul radio pdf is available here loewenzahms padlet 1 thanks to my testers ellen tickleelmo and jamie beaglegirl2 for your help 1 https //padlet com/alexandrazaminer1/ayn4uaegwde4a7oo
